text: Ben McNiece (born 22 March 1992) is a professional Australian rules footballer playing for the Essendon Football Club in the Australian Football League (AFL). He was recruited by Essendon as a category B rookie through the next generation academy in November 2016, qualifying by virtue of his mother being Indian.Front and Centre: Dons queried over international rookie pick-up He had previously played for Essendon's VFL team for the prior two seasons. He made his AFL debut in the Anzac Day clash against at the Melbourne Cricket Ground in round five of the 2017 season in an eighteen-point win. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Essendon Football Club players Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Australian people of Anglo-Indian descent Category:Australian people of Indian descent
title: Ben McNiece
